alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Wayne, southeastern Monroe and northern Ontario Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Penfield, or near East Rochester, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Irondequoit, East Rochester, Webster, Fairport, Brighton, Ontario, Penfield, Newark, Williamson, Marion, Lyons, Palmyra, Victor, Honeoye Falls, Clifton Springs, Sodus, Farmington, Walworth, and Mendon. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 43 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
